pages.title: Flowering
pages.text: While $(item)Mystical Mushrooms$() are sufficient for the purpose of dealing with $(thing)Mana$(), they're not renewable. If you upgrade your $(item)Ironwood Wand$() using your new $(item)Ember Shards$(),  it can channel some of the magicks from the core to transform the $(item)Mystical Mushrooms$() back into $(item)Mystical Flowers$().$(br)$(#f00)All colours count for this task$()

pages.heading: Mystical Flowers
pages.description: Converts $(item)Mystical Mushrooms$() to equivalent $(item)Flower$(). Plant $(item)Petals$() then use bonemeal to grow them for infinite renewable $(item)Petals$().
